text: On - Tot, Kto izgnal neveruyushchikh lyudey Pisaniya iz ikh zhilishch pri pervom sbore. Vy ne polagali, chto oni uydut. Oni zhe dumali, chto ikh kreposti zashchityat ikh ot Allakha. No Allakh nastig ikh ottuda, otkuda oni ne predpolagali, i brosil v ikh serdtsa strakh. Oni razrushayut svoi doma sobstvennymi rukami i rukami veruyushchikh. Prislushaytes' zhe k nazidaniyu, o obladayushchiye zreniyem
